de.polygonal.ds.SLLNode

type
class
A singly linked list node. Each node wraps an element and stores a reference to next list node.

Constructor

new(x : T, list : SLL<T>)
parameters
val The value to store in this node.
list The list that manages this node.

Instance Variables

next : SLLNode<T>

The next node in the list being referenced.

val : T

The node's value.

Instance Methods

getList() : SLL<T>

A reference to the list that owns this node.

hasNext() : Bool

Returns true if this node has a next node.

nextVal() : T

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError A next node does not exist (if debug flag is set).
Returns the value of the next node.

remove() : SLLNode<T>

Removes this node from the list.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.
